title: Create e-commerce website for Aadi Shop clothing store

requirements.text: Create a homepage that displays featured clothing products with images, names, and prices

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays a grid of featured clothing items
Each product card shows product image, name, and price
Products are fetched from backend storage

requirements.text: Implement backend product catalog with fields for product name, description, price, category (men/women/kids), size options, and image filename

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores product catalog with all required fields
Support for adding, updating, and retrieving products
Products are categorized by clothing type

requirements.text: Create a product listing page with filtering by category and price range

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse all available products
Filter products by category (men/women/kids)
Filter products by price range
Display product count for each category

requirements.text: Create individual product detail pages showing full product information, available sizes, and add to cart functionality

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Product detail page displays full product information
Users can select size before adding to cart
Add to cart button stores selected product and size

requirements.text: Implement shopping cart functionality with ability to add, remove, and update quantities

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart with selected size
Cart displays all items with quantity and subtotal
Users can update quantities or remove items
Cart persists across page navigation
Cart shows total price

requirements.text: Create checkout flow with customer information form (name, email, shipping address, phone number)

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page collects customer details
Form validates required fields
Order summary displays cart items and total
Orders are stored in backend with customer info and items

requirements.text: Implement order management system in backend to store and retrieve customer orders

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores order history with order ID, customer details, items, and timestamp
Support for retrieving order details by order ID
Orders include status tracking (pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered)

requirements.text: Create an admin interface for managing products (add, edit, delete) accessible through Internet Identity authentication

quotes: Create website For e business for Aadi shop clothes

acceptanceCriteria: Admin page is protected by Internet Identity authentication
Admin can add new products with all details
Admin can edit existing product information
Admin can delete products from catalog
Admin can view all orders

requirements.text: Design a modern, fashion-forward visual theme with warm earth tones, elegant typography, and spacious layouts that reflects a premium clothing retail experience
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette using warm earth tones throughout the site
Typography is elegant and readable
Layout feels spacious with adequate whitespace
Design conveys a premium shopping experience
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop

constraints: Use Internet Identity for admin authentication only
All product images must be stored as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Shopping cart must work without user authentication for guest checkout
